query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN duration IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as null_count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN duration = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as zero_count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN duration > 0 AND duration <= 60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as valid_count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN duration > 60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as over_limit_count,
  MAX(duration) as max_duration,
  MIN(duration) as min_duration
FROM podcast_highlights;
